title: WTB Low grade T205 Hoffman raw
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB Low grade T205 Hoffman raw
posts.post_content:
Posted By: J Levine
Interestingly, the Hoffman is the only card in my set that is currently graded and I would like a raw one to fill in the little blank spot. Don't get me wrong, I do own many T205 graded cards but my set is ungraded and this was bothering me last night. No, mine is not for trade either as it is a rather high grade T205. So, anybody have a low grade Hoffman in f-g condition they want to part with for relatively cheap?

Joshua

PS Still looking for a T205 Carrigan Polar Bear back as well.
